title: Palatial 18th-Century Spain Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Spa
description: Live like royalty at Palacio Matutano Dauden, an 18th-century former palace set in Spain's north-east. Located in the old Daudén Palace, built in 1773 by Sebastián Dauden and declared a National Monument in 1931, the hotel's façade and interiors have been preserved to maintain its palatial flair, with crystal chandeliers, Moorish alcoves, heavy fabric curtains and ornate, gilded accents. A spa and wellness area with a dry sauna, Turkish bath and hydromassage bath keeps relaxation levels high, while a visit to La Torre de los Nublos restaurant will satisfy gourmands, where seasonal and sustainable haute cuisine menus are served with local organic wines.
offer_address: Ondevilla Street 4, La Iglesuela del Cid, 44142, Teruel, Spain
